alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Madison; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 27 at 3:51PM EST until February 27 at 4:15PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Franklin County in central Ohio... Northeastern Madison County in central Ohio... Southeastern Union County in central Ohio... * Until 415 PM EST. * At 351 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Choctaw Lake, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Columbus, Dublin, Upper Arlington, Hilliard, Plain City, West Jefferson, Choctaw Lake, New California, Lafayette, Interstate 70 at US Route 42, Amity, State Route 29 at State Route 38, Resaca, US Route 33 at US Route 42 and Plumwood. This includes I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 75 and 82. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EST for central Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EST for central Ohio.
